el:protected.el:luamain:
enigma.ConserveLevel = 0 enigma.TwoPlayerGame = 1 create_world(20, 13) oxyd_default_flavor="b"
-- Floor Layer fill_floor("fl-concrete") draw_floor("fl-water", {3, 0}, {0, 1}, 3) set_floor("fl-swamp", 16, 2)
-- Item Layer set_item("it-trigger", 3, 0, {action="open", target="door", invisible=FALSE}) if not difficult then set_item("it-coin2", 6, 9) end
-- Stone Layer oxyd(19, 2) oxyd(19, 1) draw_border("st-greenbrown", 0, 0, 3, 3) fill_stones("st-greenbrown", 4, 0, 2, 3) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {6, 0}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {9, 0}, {1, 0}, 11) draw_stones("st-brownie", {8, 1}, {-1, 1}, 8) draw_stones("st-brownie", {10, 1}, {-1, 1}, 10) draw_stones("st-chess_white", {12, 1}, {-1, 1}, 11) draw_stones("st-brownie", {13, 2}, {-2, 2}, 5) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {0, 3}, {0, 1}, 10) draw_stones("st-chess_white", {2, 3}, {-1, 1}, 2) draw_stones("st-brownie", {4, 3}, {-1, 1}, 4) draw_stones("st-brownie", {16, 3}, {-1, 1}, 9) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {17, 3}, {0, 1}, 2) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {19, 3}, {0, 1}, 6) draw_stones("st-chess_black", {16, 5}, {-1, 1}, 7) draw_stones("st-chess_black", {18, 5}, {-1, 1}, 7) draw_stones("st-chess_black", {18, 7}, {-1, 1}, 5) draw_stones("st-brownie", {18, 9}, {-1, 1}, 3) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {19, 10}, {0, 1}, 3) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {1, 12}, {1, 0}, 2) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {4, 12}, {1, 0}, 9) draw_stones("st-greenbrown", {14, 12}, {1, 0}, 5) set_stone("st-laser-s", 8, 0, {on="1"}) set_stones("st-greenbrown", {{1, 1}, {17, 1}}) set_stones("st-chess_white", {{6, 1}, {16, 1}, {14, 3}, {12, 5}, {10, 7}, {8, 9}, {6, 11}}) set_stones("st-chess_black", {{15, 2}, {13, 4}, {11, 6}, {9, 8}, {7, 10}, {18, 11}}) set_stones("st-laser-w", {{17, 2}, {19, 9}}, {on="1"}) set_stone("st-door", 18, 3, {name="door", type="h"}) set_stones("st-stone_break", {{8, 4}, {3, 7}, {12, 2}, {7, 9}}) set_stone("st-coffee", 13, 7) set_stone("st-glass", 11, 9) set_stone("st-lightpassenger", 13, 11) set_stones("st-laser-n", {{3, 12}, {13, 12}}, {on="1"})
-- Actor Layer set_actor("ac-whiteball", 1.5, 11.5, {player="1", mouseforce="1"}) set_actor("ac-blackball", 18.5, 4.5, {player="0", mouseforce="1"})
oxyd_shuffle()
